short_summary: Snow removal services including labour, material, equipment, supervision, and transportation
description: Tender is seeking Snow Removal Services, including labour, material, equipment, supervision, and transportation in accordance with the statement of work attached at Annex A.
full_summary:
# Wellington St. Group Snow Removal Services Request for Proposal

## Contract Information

* **Contract Title**: Wellington St. Group Snow Removal Services
* **Contract ID**: WS4561327882
* **Contract Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Contract Details

* **Contract Start Date**: November 1, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: No Completion Date Specified
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 9, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date**: June 28, 2024

## Scope of Work

The successful bidder shall provide snow removal services, including labor, material, equipment, supervision, and transportation, at the following locations:

* 140 Wellington Street
* 144 Wellington Street
* 150 Wellington Street
* 180 Wellington Street
* 181 Queen Street
* 190 Sparks Street
* 51 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario

## Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is required for all bidders on June 18, 2024, at 10:30 AM EDT, at the CBC Building, 190 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario. Bidders must confirm their attendance and provide the names of the representatives attending by June 10, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.

## Trade Agreements

This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

* Caroline Richard, (she/her)
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Contract Documents

The contract documents, including the Statement of Work and annexes, can be accessed through the discovery portal at:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19769783?extsite=MTk3Njk3ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
